component.name: Intro
component.p: Welcome to the home page for your Municipal Model. This site allows you to navigate through and update your municipal model components.

The full System Architect web site contains details about Question Oriented Architecture (QOA). QOA allows you to make best use and follow the practice of ensuring that the information you capture can be used in a meaningful way.

link.label: Municipal Questions
Model Validation Questions
CREATE MY OWN QUESTION/QUERY
SYSTEM ARCHITECT XT BROWSER
DIAGRAM COMPARE
Cognos Reports
Encyclopedia Profile

component.name: rptLatestAdditions
component.fields: FIELD "Formatted Initial Date" { SOURCE PROPERTY "Initial Date" LENGTH 10 TYPE DATE } FIELD "Formatted Initial Time" { SOURCE PROPERTY "Initial Time" LENGTH 10 TYPE TIME }
component.report: Select "Formatted Initial Date" legend "Initial Date", "Formatted Initial Time" legend "Initial Time", "Initial Audit", Name, Type Where Class = Diagram, Definition Where "Formatted Initial Date" >= %SAXT_LASTWEEK% ORDERBY "Initial Date" desc, "Initial Time" desc

component.name: rptLast10ByUser
component.fields: FIELD "Formatted Last Change Date" { SOURCE PROPERTY "Last Change Date" LENGTH 10 TYPE DATE } FIELD "Formatted Last Change Time" { SOURCE PROPERTY "Last Change Time" LENGTH 10 TYPE TIME }
component.report: Select Name, Type, "Formatted Last Change Date" legend "Last Change Date", "Formatted Last Change Time" legend "Last Change Time" Where Class = Diagram, Definition Where "Last Change Audit" = %SAXT_AUDITID% Where "Formatted Last Change Date" >= %SAXT_LASTWEEK% ORDERBY "Last Change Date" desc, "Last Change Time" desc

component.name: rptTaskList
component.reportempty: You have not been allocated any tasks.
component.fields: FIELD "Complete" { SOURCE PROPERTY "Complete" LENGTH 10 TYPE NUMERIC }
component.report: Select "Due Date", Name, "Owner", "Start Date", "Status", "Priority", "Responsible", "Total Work", "Complete" legend "% Complete" Where Class = Definition Where "Type Number" = 822 REM "Task Item" Where Complete < 100 Where Status <> "Completed" Where Owner = %SAXT_AUDITID% ORDERBY "Due Date", Name

component.name: Intro
component.P: This site allows you to ask questions about the municipal model. Questions are grouped into the seven modelling domains; Organization Unit, Program, Service, Process, Resource, Target Group and Project.
You may also create your own questions.

link.target: ip/getpage.aspx?reportfile=MRM XT Questions Reports&reportname=Organization Unit accountable for Programs&DDID=&stylesheet=/stylesheets/lists.xsl
link.label: Organization Unit acountable for Programs

component.name: Intro
component.p: Health of Municipal Model questions allow for the user to drill into the municipal model information for consistency, audit trails, counts and statistics. The health of the enterprise architecture can be summarised here.

link.target: ip/getpage.aspx?reportfile=HealthOfArchitecture&reportname=Count of All Definitions Modified by Audit ID&DDID=&stylesheet=/stylesheets/Count of Groups (All).xsl
link.label: Which Audit ID has modified the most definitions?

link.target: ip/getpage.aspx?reportfile=HealthOfArchitecture&reportname=Count of All Definitions Created by Audit ID&DDID=&stylesheet=/stylesheets/Count of Groups (All).xsl
link.label: Which Audit ID has created the most definitions?

link.target: ip/getpage.aspx?reportfile=HealthOfArchitecture&reportname=Count of All Diagrams Modified By Audit ID&DDID=&stylesheet=/stylesheets/Count of Groups (All).xsl
link.label: Which Audit ID has modified the most diagrams?

link.target: ip/getpage.aspx?reportfile=HealthOfArchitecture&reportname=Count of All Diagrams Created by Audit ID&DDID=&stylesheet=/stylesheets/Count of Groups (All).xsl
link.label: Which Audit ID has created the most diagrams?

link.target: ip/getpage.aspx?reportfile=HealthOfArchitecture&reportname=Count of All Definitions where Description is Blank by AuditID&DDID=&stylesheet=/stylesheets/Count of Groups (All).xsl
link.label: A count of all definitions where there is no description grouped by Audit ID

link.target: ip/getpage.aspx?reportfile=HealthOfArchitecture&reportname=Count of Checked Out Definitions by AuditID&DDID=&stylesheet=/stylesheets/Count of Groups (All).xsl
link.label: A count of all definitions checked out grouped by Audit ID

link.target: ip/getpage.aspx?reportfile=HealthOfArchitecture&reportname=Count of Checked Out Diagrams by AuditID&DDID=&stylesheet=/stylesheets/Count of Groups (All).xsl
link.label: A count of all diagrams checked out grouped by Audit ID

link.target: ip/getpage.aspx?reportfile=HealthOfArchitecture&reportname=Count of All Definitions Modified this year&DDID=&stylesheet=/stylesheets/Count of Types (All).xsl
link.label: A count of all definitions modified after 31 Dec 2004

link.target: ip/getpage.aspx?reportfile=HealthOfArchitecture&reportname=Count of All Definitions Created this year&DDID=&stylesheet=/stylesheets/Count of Types (All).xsl
link.label: A count of all definitions created after 31 Dec 2004

link.target: ip/getpage.aspx?reportfile=HealthOfArchitecture&reportname=Count of All Definitions Grouped by Modification Date&DDID=&stylesheet=/stylesheets/Count of Groups (All).xsl
link.label: A count by date of the number of definitions created

link.target: ip/getpage.aspx?reportfile=HealthOfArchitecture&reportname=Timeline of POLDAT Definitions&DDID=&stylesheet=/stylesheets/TimeLine with Legend for SA Date Properties Year In and Year Out.xsl
link.label: Timeline of POLDAT definitions from initial date to last updated date

link.target: ip/getpage.aspx?reportfile=HealthOfArchitecture&reportname=Count of POLDAT Definitions&DDID=&stylesheet=/stylesheets/Count of Types (All).xsl
link.label: A count of POLDAT Definitions

link.target: ip/getpage.aspx?reportfile=HealthOfArchitecture&reportname=Count of All Types of Definitions&DDID=&stylesheet=/stylesheets/Count of Types (All).xsl
link.label: A count of all definitions grouped by type of definition

link.target: ip/getpage.aspx?reportfile=HealthOfArchitecture&reportname=Count of All Types of Diagrams&DDID=&stylesheet=/stylesheets/Count of Types (All).xsl
link.label: A count of all diagrams grouped by diagram type

link.target: ip/getpage.aspx?reportfile=HealthOfArchitecture&reportname=Count of Checked Out Definitions by Definition Type&DDID=&stylesheet=/stylesheets/Count of Types (All).xsl
link.label: A count of all definitions checked out grouped by Definition Type

link.target: ip/getpage.aspx?reportfile=HealthOfArchitecture&reportname=Count of Checked Out Diagrams by DiagramType&DDID=&stylesheet=/stylesheets/Count of Types (All).xsl
link.label: A count of all diagrams checked out grouped by Diagram Type

link.target: ip/getpage.aspx?reportfile=HealthOfArchitecture&reportname=Count of All Definitions where Description is Blank&DDID=&stylesheet=/stylesheets/Count of Types (All).xsl
link.label: A count of all definitions where there is no description

link.target: ip/getpage.aspx?reportfile=HealthOfArchitecture&reportname=Count of POLDAT Definitions where Description is Blank&DDID=&stylesheet=/stylesheets/Count of Types (All).xsl
link.label: A count of POLDAT definitions where Description is Blank

link.label: A count of how many words a user has entered for definitions

link.label: A count of POLDAT definitions that do not Reference anything

link.target: ip/getpage.aspx?reportfile=HealthOfArchitecture&reportname=Count of All Definitions that do not Reference anything&DDID=&stylesheet=/stylesheets/Count of Types (All).xsl
